column1: Cormeilles-en-Parisis is a commune in the Val-d'Oise department in Île-de-France in Northern France.
Cormeilles-en-Parisis is served by Cormeilles-en-Parisis station on the Transilien Paris – Saint-Lazare suburban rail line.
It only takes 20 minutes to get to the station using ligne J from Paris Saint-Lazare.

column2: artist and chemist who is recognized for his invention of the Daguerreotype process of photography

column3: former leader of French Communist Party (PCF)
